articles.title: Why is India facing its worst power crisis in over six years?
articles.description: Power generation from coal-fired plants, which account for nearly 75% of India's annual electricity output, is expected to grow 17.6% this year, the highest rate in over a decade.

India is facing its worst power crisis in over six years as a heatwave bakes vast swathes of South Asia, causing widespread power outages.
